contents:
Do you need anything else other than writing symbo...

Can you make a little bit understanding before retorting?
Chinese as language is merely one among all our Human Languages,
I am not talking writing symbols by it's own, I am talking about human being exists before all kind of these symbol, as evolve with all the writings.
And we will evolve with all languages including Chinese.

If you want Chinese die as language, how can we believe you can save Chinese people when you judge their language to die?

Can you tell me how you think this: don't judge or you will be judged?

你可以在为扛而扛之前做一点阅读理解吗？
中文不过是所有人类语言中的一种，
我不是在说符号系统，
我是在说人类的进化早就在符号系统之前开始了，
同时符号也是和人类一起进化。
并且我们还会继续进化包括中文。
如果你想要中文死亡，我们如何相信你不想要中国人死亡？

你可以告诉我你如何理解：不要裁决不然你会被裁决？
